I am Hope: Taupō emergency services members complete lake charity walk https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/i-am-hope-taupo-emergency-services-members-complete-lake-charity-walk/5IU5GV6JQ5CELMD4KJNFZV23CI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/i-am-hope-taupo-emergency-services-members-complete-lake-charity-walk/5IU5GV6JQ5CELMD4KJNFZV23CI/ Chris Marshall, Danielle ZollickhoferThe Waikato Herald shared their story last month. Now, they've completed the challenge. Wed, 13 Nov 2024 02:39:12 +0000 The group of 12 emergency services personnel near the beginning of the challenge to tackle the 160km walk around Lake Taupō in 40 hours. Photo / Chris Marshall
Christopher Luxon’s tips for Elon Musk as Donald Trump announces role for Tesla, X chief https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/christopher-luxons-tips-for-elon-musk-as-donald-trump-announces-role-for-tesla-x-chief/GUBBEDTR3BDX3KQBM3XG3YTJGA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/christopher-luxons-tips-for-elon-musk-as-donald-trump-announces-role-for-tesla-x-chief/GUBBEDTR3BDX3KQBM3XG3YTJGA/ Jamie EnsorThe Trump statement said the department may be the 'Manhattan Project' of 'our time'. Five Gisborne marae, including Puketawai, to relocate due to flood risks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/ Five-gisborne-marae-include-puketawai-to-relocate-due-to-flood-risks/2CDQWWJXCNF3FBPTZVNNMYSQGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/ Five-gisborne-marae-include-puketawai-to-relocate-due-to-flood-risks/2CDQWWJXCNF3FBPTZVNNMYSQGI/ Zita Campbell, Local Democracy ReporterPuketawai Marae, hit hard by Cyclone Gabrielle, plans to shift to safer, higher ground. Wed, 13 Nov 2024 02:14:09 +0000 Puketawai Marae trustee Victor Walker says many whānau were shocked when seeing the drone shot of the Cyclone Gabrielle-stricken marae sitting in a lake, revealing chest-height floodwaters had entered the wharenui and kōhanga. Photo / Uawa Live
Nelson woman fined $1200 for taking more than 1000 cockles from traditional fishery reserve https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-woman-fined-1200-for-take-more-than-1000-cockles-from-traditional-fishery-reserve/P6UJ4FWC6RERTKRXBLU3UYS42I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-woman-fined-1200-for-take-more-than-1000-cockles-from-traditional-fishery-reserve/P6UJ4FWC6RERTKRXBLU3UYS42I/ Tracy NealJudge: 'If everyone did that, we would not have any cockles left in our country'.
